qa.name: Commander Sarah Chen
qa.appearance: Athletic build, with short black hair

hf.name: Dr. Alex Novak
hf.appearance: Lanky, with disheveled brown hair and glasses

tr.name: AI Assistant ARIA
tr.appearance: Holographic projection of a genderless humanoid

xc.name: Lieutenant Mike Ortiz
xc.appearance: Muscular, with a warm smile and buzz cut

json_to_edit.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of space, loneliness became my constant companion.
json_to_edit.description: Commander Sarah Chen experiences isolation aboard the International Space Station.
json_to_edit.lighting: Harsh, artificial light with occasional Earth glow
json_to_edit.ambience_sound_keywords: Hum of life support systems, occasional beeps
json_to_edit.name: Solitude in Orbit
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Commander Sarah Chen grapples with loneliness while on a long-term space mission.

qa.action: The International Space Station floating in the vast emptiness of space, Earth visible in the background.

hf.action: Commander Sarah Chen floating in the observation module, gazing out at the stars with a contemplative expression.

tr.action: Sarah's eyes, reflecting the pinpoints of distant stars, a tear forming in the corner.

xc.action: Dr. Alex Novak working frantically at a computer terminal, surrounded by floating holographic displays.

ka.action: AI Assistant ARIA's hologram materializing next to Sarah, offering comforting words.

fn.action: Lieutenant Mike Ortiz's hands adjusting communication controls, trying to establish a clear signal with Earth.

af.action: The crew gathered in the common area for a meal, their laughter contrasting with the emptiness outside.

qo.action: Sarah writing in a physical journal, her personal thoughts floating alongside her in zero gravity.

fp.action: A family photo stuck to a wall, Sarah's finger gently touching the faces of her loved ones.

va.action: Sarah in her sleeping pod, eyes wide open, surrounded by the quiet hum of the station as others sleep.

edit_command: Add a new shot after every two existing shots, focusing on the Earth as seen from space. Don't change anything else.

updated_json.voice_over: In the vast emptiness of space, loneliness became my constant companion.
updated_json.description: Commander Sarah Chen experiences isolation aboard the International Space Station.
updated_json.lighting: Harsh, artificial light with occasional Earth glow
updated_json.ambience_sound_keywords: Hum of life support systems, occasional beeps
updated_json.name: Solitude in Orbit
updated_json.scene_summary: Commander Sarah Chen grapples with loneliness while on a long-term space mission.

qa.action: The International Space Station floating in the vast emptiness of space, Earth visible in the background.

hf.action: Commander Sarah Chen floating in the observation module, gazing out at the stars with a contemplative expression.

zx.action: A breathtaking view of Earth, its blue oceans and swirling white clouds visible from space, contrasting with the darkness around it.

tr.action: Sarah's eyes, reflecting the pinpoints of distant stars, a tear forming in the corner.

xc.action: Dr. Alex Novak working frantically at a computer terminal, surrounded by floating holographic displays.

wy.action: Earth slowly rotating, the terminator line between day and night clearly visible, city lights twinkling on the dark side.

ka.action: AI Assistant ARIA's hologram materializing next to Sarah, offering comforting words.

fn.action: Lieutenant Mike Ortiz's hands adjusting communication controls, trying to establish a clear signal with Earth.

uv.action: A weather system forming over the Pacific Ocean, the swirl of clouds creating a mesmerizing pattern visible from space.

af.action: The crew gathered in the common area for a meal, their laughter contrasting with the emptiness outside.

qo.action: Sarah writing in a physical journal, her personal thoughts floating alongside her in zero gravity.

st.action: The curvature of Earth's horizon, a thin blue line separating the planet from the blackness of space, captured through a space station window.

fp.action: A family photo stuck to a wall, Sarah's finger gently touching the faces of her loved ones.

va.action: Sarah in her sleeping pod, eyes wide open, surrounded by the quiet hum of the station as others sleep.

lm.action: A lightning storm illuminating Earth's atmosphere, flashes of light dancing across the planet's surface as seen from the space station.

label.rationale: we will add new shots focusing on earth as seen from space after every two existing shots. this will create a rhythm of human-focused shots alternating with earth views, emphasizing the astronauts' isolation while reminding the audience of the planet they've left behind. we'll maintain the existing shot order and content, only inserting new earth-focused shots at regular intervals. this will increase the total number of shots from 10 to 15.

value.action: A breathtaking view of Earth, its blue oceans and swirling white clouds visible from space, contrasting with the darkness around it.
